mapper.select: SELECT E.EMPL_ID, E.EMPL_NM, UF.UPLOAD_FILE_STRE_NM AS PROFL_PHOTO_FILE_STRE_NM FROM EMPL E JOIN PROFL PF ON PF.PROFL_EMPL_ID = E.EMPL_ID JOIN UPLOAD_FILE UF ON PF.PROFL_ETPR_CODE = UF.UPLOAD_FILE_ETPR_CODE WHERE E.COMMON_CODE_DEPT = ( SELECT e1.COMMON_CODE_DEPT FROM EMPL e1 WHERE e1.EMPL_ID = #{emplId} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SNTNC(SNTNC_ETPR_CODE, SNTNC_WRTING_EMPL_ID, SNTNC_CN, SNTNC_WRTING_DATE, COMMON_CODE_SNTNC_CTGRY) VALUES (#{sntncEtprCode}, #{sntncWrtingEmplId}, #{sntncCn}, SYSDATE, 'SNTNC010')
mapper.select: SELECT s.SNTNC_ETPR_CODE, s.SNTNC_CN, s.SNTNC_WRTING_EMPL_ID, s.SNTNC_WRTING_DATE, s.COMMON_CODE_SNTNC_CTGRY, u.UPLOAD_FILE_ORGINL_NM, u.UPLOAD_FILE_SN, u.UPLOAD_FILE_SIZE FROM SNTNC s JOIN EMPL e ON s.SNTNC_WRTING_EMPL_ID = e.EMPL_ID LEFT JOIN UPLOAD_FILE u ON s.SNTNC_ETPR_CODE = u.UPLOAD_FILE_ETPR_CODE WHERE s.COMMON_CODE_SNTNC_CTGRY = 'SNTNC010' AND e.COMMON_CODE_DEPT = ( SELECT e1.COMMON_CODE_DEPT FROM EMPL e1 WHERE e1.EMPL_ID = #{emplId} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO UPLOAD_FILE(UPLOAD_FILE_SN, UPLOAD_FILE_ETPR_CODE, UPLOAD_FILE_ORGINL_NM, UPLOAD_FILE_STRE_NM, UPLOAD_FILE_SIZE, UPLOAD_FILE_RGSDE) VALUES (UPLOAD_FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{sntncEtprCode}, #{originalFileName}, #{newFileName}, #{fileSize}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO RECOMEND (SNTNC_ETPR_CODE, RECOMEND_EMPL_ID, RECOMEND_SN) VALUES (#{sntncEtprCode}, #{recomendEmplId}, RECOMEND_SEQ.NEXTVAL)
INSERT INTO ANSWER( ANSWER_NO, SNTNC_ETPR_CODE, ANSWER_WRTING_EMPL_ID, ANSWER_CN, ANSWER_DATE) VALUES (ANSWER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{sntncEtprCode}, #{answerWrtingEmplId}, #{answerCn}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT A.ANSWER_NO, A.ANSWER_CN, A.ANSWER_DATE, A.ANSWER_WRTING_EMPL_ID, UF.UPLOAD_FILE_STRE_NM AS proflPhotoFileStreNm FROM ANSWER A JOIN PROFL P ON A.ANSWER_WRTING_EMPL_ID = P.PROFL_EMPL_ID JOIN UPLOAD_FILE UF ON UF.UPLOAD_FILE_ETPR_CODE = P.PROFL_ETPR_CODE WHERE A.SNTNC_ETPR_CODE = #{sntncEtprCode} ORDER BY A.ANSWER_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SNTNC(SNTNC_ETPR_CODE, SNTNC_WRTING_EMPL_ID, SNTNC_SJ, SNTNC_CN, SNTNC_WRTING_DATE, COMMON_CODE_SNTNC_CTGRY) VALUES (#{sntncEtprCode}, #{sntncWrtingEmplId}, #{sntncSj}, #{sntncCn}, SYSDATE, 'SNTNC011')
mapper.select: SELECT S.SNTNC_ETPR_CODE, S.SNTNC_WRTING_EMPL_ID, S.SNTNC_SJ, S.SNTNC_CN, S.SNTNC_WRTING_DATE FROM SNTNC S JOIN EMPL E ON E.EMPL_ID = S.SNTNC_WRTING_EMPL_ID WHERE S.COMMON_CODE_SNTNC_CTGRY = 'SNTNC011' AND E.COMMON_CODE_DEPT = ( SELECT E1.COMMON_CODE_DEPT FROM EMPL E1 WHERE E1.EMPL_ID = #{emplId} )
